entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 05:21 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow at times heavy mixed with freezing rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
